def bb_intersection_over_union(boxA, boxB):
    boxA = [int(x) for x in boxA]
    boxB = [int(x) for x in boxB]

    xA = max(boxA[0], boxB[0])
    yA = max(boxA[1], boxB[1])
    xB = min(boxA[2], boxB[2])
    yB = min(boxA[3], boxB[3])

    interArea = max(0, xB - xA + 1) * max(0, yB - yA + 1)

    boxAArea = (boxA[2] - boxA[0] + 1) * (boxA[3] - boxA[1] + 1)
    boxBArea = (boxB[2] - boxB[0] + 1) * (boxB[3] - boxB[1] + 1)
    
    iou = interArea / float(boxAArea + boxBArea - interArea)

    return iou

typedef struct Bbox
{
    int x1;
    int y1;

    int y2;

float iou(Bbox box1,Bbox box2)
{
    max_x = max(box1.x1,box2.x1);  // æ‰¾å‡ºå·¦ä¸Šè§’åæ ‡å“ªä¸ªå¤§
    min_x = min(box1.x2,box2.x2);  // æ‰¾å‡ºå³ä¸Šè§’åæ ‡å“ªä¸ªå°
    max_y = max(box1.y1,box2.y1);
    min_y = min(box1.y2,box2.y2);
    if(min_x<=max_x || min_y<=max_y) // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰é‡å 
        return 0;
    float over_area = (min_x - max_x) * (min_y - max_y);  // è®¡ç®—é‡å é¢ç§¯
    float area_a = (box1.x2 - boxa.x1) * (box1.y2 - boxa.y1);
    float area_b = (box2.x2 - boxb.x1) * (box2.y2 - boxb.y1);
    float iou = over_area / (area_a + area_b - over_area);
    return iou;
}

def nms(det, thresh):
    x1 = det[..., 0]
    y1 = det[..., 1]
    x2 = det[..., 2]
    y2 = det[..., 3]
    scores = det[..., 4]
    area = (x2 - x1 + 1) * (y2 - y1 + 1)
    order = np.argsort(scores)[::-1]  # Returns the indices that would sort an array.
    keep = []
    while order.size > 0:
        i = order[0]
        keep.append(i)
        xx1 = np.maximum(x1[i], x1[order[1:]])
        yy1 = np.maximum(y1[i], y1[order[1:]])
        xx2 = np.minimum(x2[i], x2[order[1:]])
        yy2 = np.minimum(x2[i], x2[order[1:]])
        w = np.maximum(0, xx2 - xx1 + 1)
        h = np.maximum(0, yy2 - yy1 + 1)
        inter = w * h
        union = area[i] + area[order[1:]] - inter
        iou = inter / union
        next_i = np.where(iou <= thresh)[0]  # åªæœ‰æ¡ä»¶ (condition)ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰xå’Œyï¼Œåˆ™è¾“å‡ºæ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶ (å³é0) å…ƒç´ çš„åæ ‡
        order = order[next_i + 1]
    return keep

vector<Bbox> nms(vector<Bbox>&vec_boxs, float threshold)
{
    vector<Bbox>  res;
    while(vec_boxs.size() > 0)

        sort(vec_boxs.begin(),vec_boxs.end(),cmp);

    return res;
}

def conv_naive(x, c_out, ksize=3, padding=0, stride=1):
    b, c_in, h, w = x.shape
    kernel = np.random.rand(c_out, c_in, ksize, ksize)
    out_height = (h - ksize + 2 * padding) // stride + 1
    out_width = (w - ksize + 2 * padding) // stride + 1

    out_x = np.random.rand(b, c_out, out_height,  out_width)
    if padding > 0:
        pad_x = np.zeros((b, c_in, h + 2 * padding, w + 2 * padding))
        pad_x[..., padding:-padding, padding:-padding] = x
    else:
        pad_x = x

    for y in range(out_height):
        for x in range(out_width):
            roi = pad_x[..., y * stride:y * stride + ksize, x * stride: x * stride + ksize]
            conv = np.tile(np.expand_dims(roi, axis=1), (1, c_out, 1, 1, 1)) * kernel
            # conv = np.repeat(np.expand_dims(roi, axis=1), axis=1, repeats=c_out) * kernel
            out_x[..., y, x] = np.squeeze(np.sum(conv, axis=(2, 3, 4), keepdims=True), axis=(2, 3, 4))

    return out_x

void conv2(int** filter, int **mat, int** res, const int filter_rows, const int filter_cols, const int mat_rows, const int mat_cols)
{
    assert(filter_cols < mat_cols && filter_rows < mat_rows);
    for(int i = 0; i < mat_rows - 1; ++i)
        for (int j = 0; j < mat_cols - 1; ++j)
        {
            int tmp = 0;
            for (int m = 0; m < filter_rows; ++m)
                for (int n = 0; n < filter_cols; ++n)
                    if(0 <= i -m  && i - m < mat_rows && 0 <= j - n && j - n < mat_cols)
                        tmp += filter[m][n] * mat[i - m][j - n];//å·ç§¯å…¬å¼

            res[i][j] = tmp;
        }
}

std::vector<std::vector<int> > conv2(std::vector<std::vector<int> > filter, std::vector<std::vector<int> > mat )//å‘é‡ç‰ˆæœ¬
{

    const int mat_cols = mat[0].size();

    assert(filter_cols < mat_cols && filter_rows < mat_rows);
    std::vector<std::vector<int> > res(mat_rows, std::vector<int>(mat_cols, 0));

def max_pooling(x, kernel_size=2, stride=2):
    b, c_in, h, w = x.shape
    ow = (w - kernel_size) // stride + 1
    oh = (h - kernel_size) // stride + 1

    out = np.zeros([b, c_in, oh, ow])
    x_input = x
    for y in range(oh):
        for x in range(ow):
            roi = x_input[..., y * stride: y * stride + kernel_size, x * stride: x * stride + kernel_size]
            max_val = np.squeeze(np.max(roi, axis=(2, 3), keepdims=True), axis=(2, 3))
            out[..., y, x] = max_val
    return out
ç‰ˆæœ¬2(åå‘ä¼ æ’­)
import numpy as np
import torch
class MaxPooling2D:
    def __init__(self, kernel_size=(2, 2), stride=2):
        self.kernel_size = kernel_size
        self.w_height = kernel_size[0]
        self.w_width = kernel_size[1]

        self.stride = stride

        self.x = None
        self.in_height = None
        self.in_width = None

        self.out_height = None
        self.out_width = None

        self.arg_max = None

    def __call__(self, x):
        self.x = x
        self.in_height = np.shape(x)[0]
        self.in_width = np.shape(x)[1]

        self.out_height = int((self.in_height - self.w_height) / self.stride) + 1
        self.out_width = int((self.in_width - self.w_width) / self.stride) + 1

        out = np.zeros((self.out_height, self.out_width))
        self.arg_max = np.zeros_like(out, dtype=np.int32)

        for i in range(self.out_height):
            for j in range(self.out_width):
                start_i = i * self.stride
                start_j = j * self.stride
                end_i = start_i + self.w_height
                end_j = start_j + self.w_width
                out[i, j] = np.max(x[start_i: end_i, start_j: end_j])
                self.arg_max[i, j] = np.argmax(x[start_i: end_i, start_j: end_j])
        self.arg_max = self.arg_max
        return out

    def backward(self, d_loss):
        dx = np.zeros_like(self.x)
        for i in range(self.out_height):
            for j in range(self.out_width):
                start_i = i * self.stride
                start_j = j * self.stride
                end_i = start_i + self.w_height
                end_j = start_j + self.w_width
                index = np.unravel_index(self.arg_max[i, j], self.kernel_size)
                dx[start_i:end_i, start_j:end_j][index] = d_loss[i, j] #
        return dx

def pooling(feature_map, size=2, stride=2):
    channel=feature_map.shape[0]
    height=feature_map.shape[1]
    width=feature_map.shape[2]
    padding_height=np.uint16(round((height-size+1)/stride))
    padding_width=np.uint16(round((width-size+1)/stride))
    print(padding_height,padding_width)

    pool_out = np.zeros((channel,padding_height,padding_width),dtype=np.uint8)
    
    for map_num in range(channel):  
        out_height = 0  
        for r in np.arange(0,height, stride):  
            out_width = 0  
            for c in np.arange(0, width, stride):  
                pool_out[map_num,out_height, out_width] = np.max(feature_map[map_num,r:r+size,c:c+size])  
                out_width=out_width+1
            out_height=out_height+1
    return pool_out

ç‰ˆæœ¬1(ç®€å•ç‰ˆ)
def avg_pooling(x, kernel_size=2, stride=2):
    b, c_in, h, w = x.shape
    ow = (w - kernel_size) // stride + 1
    oh = (h - kernel_size) // stride + 1

    out = np.zeros([b, c_in, oh, ow])
    x_input = x
    for y in range(oh):
        for x in range(ow):
            roi = x_input[..., y * stride: y * stride + kernel_size, x * stride: x * stride + kernel_size]
            max_val = np.average(roi, axis=(2, 3))
            out[..., y, x] = max_val
    return out
ç‰ˆæœ¬2(åå‘ä¼ æ’­)
import numpy as np
import torch

class AvgPooling2D:
    def __init__(self, kernel_size=(2, 2), stride=2):
        self.stride = stride
        self.kernel_size = kernel_size
        self.w_height = kernel_size[0]
        self.w_width = kernel_size[1]

    def __call__(self, x):
        self.x = x
        self.in_height = x.shape[0]
        self.in_width = x.shape[1]

        self.out_height = int((self.in_height - self.w_height) / self.stride) + 1
        self.out_width = int((self.in_width - self.w_width) / self.stride) + 1
        out = np.zeros((self.out_height, self.out_width))

        for i in range(self.out_height):
            for j in range(self.out_width):
                start_i = i * self.stride
                start_j = j * self.stride
                end_i = start_i + self.w_height
                end_j = start_j + self.w_width
                out[i, j] = np.mean(x[start_i: end_i, start_j: end_j])
        return out

    def backward(self, d_loss):
        dx = np.zeros_like(self.x)

        for i in range(self.out_height):
            for j in range(self.out_width):
                start_i = i * self.stride
                start_j = j * self.stride
                end_i = start_i + self.w_height
                end_j = start_j + self.w_width
                dx[start_i: end_i, start_j: end_j] = d_loss[i, j] / (self.w_width * self.w_height)
        return dx

# soft_nmsæ“ä½œï¼Œè¿™é‡Œå‡è®¾boxesæ˜¯æ— åº(æœªæŒ‰scoreåšé™åº)çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ¯è½®soft_nmsè¿­ä»£éƒ½éœ€è¦ç±»ä¼¼å†’æ³¡æ’åºæ“ä½œï¼Œé€‰æ‹©å½“å‰top-1 bboxåšNMS
# Ntï¼šè®¡ç®—IoUçš„é˜ˆå€¼ï¼ŒIoU > Ntï¼Œå¯¹åº”bboxçš„scoreæƒé‡å°±è¦é™ä½
# thresholdï¼šé™æƒåé€šè¿‡thresholdè¿›ä¸€æ­¥å‰”é™¤ä½æƒé‡bbox
def cpu_soft_nms(boxes, sigma=0.5, Nt=0.3, threshold=0.001, method=0):
    N = boxes.shape[0]
    for i in range(N):
        maxscore = boxes[i, 4]  # è·å–å½“å‰indexä¸‹çš„bbox
        maxpos = i

        tx1 = boxes[i, 0]
        ty1 = boxes[i, 1]
        tx2 = boxes[i, 2]
        ty2 = boxes[i, 3]
        ts = boxes[i, 4]

        pos = i + 1  # ä¸‹é¢æ“ä½œå°±å¾ˆå¸¸è§„äº†ï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ°å½“å‰index iä¹‹åæ‰€æœ‰bboxesä¸­ï¼Œscoreæœ€å¤§çš„bboxï¼Œå¹¶å°†ä¹‹èµ‹å€¼ç»™maxscoreã€maxpos
        while pos < N:
            if maxscore < boxes[pos, 4]:
                maxscore = boxes[pos, 4]
                maxpos = pos
            pos = pos + 1

        # ä¸‹é¢æ“ä½œæ›´ç®€å•ï¼Œæƒ³æƒ³æˆ‘ä»¬æœ€å¼€å§‹å­¦Cè¯­è¨€ï¼Œaã€bä¸¤å˜é‡å¦‚ä½•äº¤æ¢
        # add max box as a detection
        boxes[i, 0] = boxes[maxpos, 0]  # maxposå†…çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæ”¾åˆ°index iå¤„ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯å½“å‰éœ€è¦å¤„ç†çš„bbox
        boxes[i, 1] = boxes[maxpos, 1]
        boxes[i, 2] = boxes[maxpos, 2]
        boxes[i, 3] = boxes[maxpos, 3]
        boxes[i, 4] = boxes[maxpos, 4]

        # swap ith box with position of max box
        boxes[maxpos, 0] = tx1  # åˆ«å¿˜äº†tx1ä¸­å¯æ˜¯ä¿å­˜äº†boxes[i,0]å¤‡ä»½çš„
        boxes[maxpos, 1] = ty1
        boxes[maxpos, 2] = tx2
        boxes[maxpos, 3] = ty2
        boxes[maxpos, 4] = ts

        tx1 = boxes[i, 0]  # æ­¤æ—¶tx1å°±ä¿å­˜çš„maxposä½ç½®çš„bboxä¿¡æ¯äº†
        ty1 = boxes[i, 1]
        tx2 = boxes[i, 2]
        ty2 = boxes[i, 3]
        ts = boxes[i, 4]

        pos = i + 1
        # NMS iterations, note that N changes if detection boxes fall below thresholdï¼ŒNå€¼æ˜¯åŠ¨æ€å˜åŒ–çš„
        while pos < N:  # å‘ååšNMSæ¯”è¾ƒ
            x1 = boxes[pos, 0]  # å½“å‰ä½ç½®çš„bbox
            y1 = boxes[pos, 1]
            x2 = boxes[pos, 2]
            y2 = boxes[pos, 3]
            s = boxes[pos, 4]

            area = (x2 - x1 + 1) * (y2 - y1 + 1)  # posä¸‹boxçš„é¢ç§¯
            iw = (min(tx2, x2) - max(tx1, x1) + 1)  # è®¡ç®—Insectionçš„å®½iwï¼Œå¦‚æœiw < 0ï¼Œè¯´æ˜æ²¡ç›¸äº¤ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥å¿½ç•¥äº†
            if iw > 0:
                ih = (min(ty2, y2) - max(ty1, y1) + 1)  # è®¡ç®—Insectionçš„å®½ihï¼Œå¦‚æœih < 0ï¼Œè¯´æ˜æ²¡ç›¸äº¤ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥å¿½ç•¥äº†
                if ih > 0:
                    ua = float((tx2 - tx1 + 1) * (ty2 - ty1 + 1) + area - iw * ih)  # Uçš„é¢ç§¯
                    ov = iw * ih / ua  # iou between max box and detection box

                    if method == 1:  # soft_nmsä¸­linearé™æƒæ“ä½œï¼Œä¸ovè´Ÿç›¸å…³
                        if ov > Nt:
                            weight = 1 - ov
                        else:
                            weight = 1
                    elif method == 2:  # soft_nmsä¸­gaussiané™æƒæ“ä½œ
                        weight = np.exp(-(ov * ov) / sigma)
                    else:  # original NMSï¼Œweight = 0å°±ç›´æ¥æŠŠscoreç½®0
                        if ov > Nt:
                            weight = 0
                        else:
                            weight = 1

                    boxes[pos, 4] = weight * boxes[pos, 4]  # æƒé‡é‡æ–°è°ƒæ•´

                    # if box score falls below threshold, discard the box by swapping with last boxï¼Œupdate N
                    # å¦‚æœbboxè°ƒæ•´åçš„æƒé‡ï¼Œå·²ç»å°äºé˜ˆå€¼thresholdï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¿™ä¸ªbboxå°±å¯ä»¥å¿½ç•¥äº†ï¼Œ
                    # æ“ä½œæ–¹å¼æ˜¯ç›´æ¥ç”¨æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰æ•ˆçš„bboxæ›¿æ¢å½“å‰posä¸Šçš„bbox
                    if boxes[pos, 4] < threshold:
                        boxes[pos, 0] = boxes[N - 1, 0]
                        boxes[pos, 1] = boxes[N - 1, 1]
                        boxes[pos, 2] = boxes[N - 1, 2]
                        boxes[pos, 3] = boxes[N - 1, 3]
                        boxes[pos, 4] = boxes[N - 1, 4]
                        N = N - 1  # N-1ä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„bboxå·²ç»èµ‹å€¼åˆ°å‰é¢äº†ï¼Œè¯¥bboxå°±å¯ä»¥å¿½ç•¥äº†ï¼›
                        pos = pos - 1  # posä½ç½®ä¸Šå¼•å…¥äº†æ–°çš„æœ‰æ•ˆbbox(N-1)ï¼Œå°±éœ€è¦å†è®¡ç®—ä¸€éäº†

            pos = pos + 1  # å½“å‰pos bboxè®¡ç®—å®Œæ¯•

    # æ±‚æ»¡è¶³soft_nmsç­›é€‰æ¡ä»¶çš„æ‰€æœ‰bboxæ•°é‡ï¼Œå¹¶æ‰“æ•£ä¸ºlistï¼Œä½†ä¸€ä¸ªé—®é¢˜æ˜¯ï¼šå¦‚ä½•ä¸bbox indexå¯¹åº”èµ·æ¥ï¼Ÿ

    # ä¸è¿‡æ¯ä¸ªbboxçš„scoreä¹ŸåŒæ ·ç»è¿‡soft-nmsè°ƒæ•´äº†

ç‰ˆæœ¬2
def py_cpu_softnms(dets, sc, Nt=0.3, sigma=0.5, thresh=0.001, method=2):
    """
    py_cpu_softnms
    :param dets:   boexs åæ ‡çŸ©é˜µ format [y1, x1, y2, x2]
    :param sc:     æ¯ä¸ª boxes å¯¹åº”çš„åˆ†æ•°
    :param Nt:     iou äº¤å é—¨é™
    :param sigma:  ä½¿ç”¨ gaussian å‡½æ•°çš„æ–¹å·®
    :param thresh: æœ€åçš„åˆ†æ•°é—¨é™
    :param method: ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•
    :return:       ç•™ä¸‹çš„ boxes çš„ index
    """

    # indexes concatenate boxes with the last column
    N = dets.shape[0]
    indexes = np.array([np.arange(N)])
    dets = np.concatenate((dets, indexes.T), axis=1)

    # the order of boxes coordinate is [y1,x1,y2,x2]
    y1 = dets[:, 0]
    x1 = dets[:, 1]
    y2 = dets[:, 2]
    x2 = dets[:, 3]
    scores = sc
    areas = (x2 - x1 + 1) * (y2 - y1 + 1)

    for i in range(N):
        # intermediate parameters for later parameters exchange
        tBD = dets[i, :].copy()
        tscore = scores[i].copy()
        tarea = areas[i].copy()
        pos = i + 1

        #
        if i != N-1:
            maxscore = np.max(scores[pos:], axis=0)
            maxpos = np.argmax(scores[pos:], axis=0)
        else:
            maxscore = scores[-1]
            maxpos = 0
        if tscore < maxscore:
            dets[i, :] = dets[maxpos + i + 1, :]
            dets[maxpos + i + 1, :] = tBD
            tBD = dets[i, :]

            scores[i] = scores[maxpos + i + 1]
            scores[maxpos + i + 1] = tscore
            tscore = scores[i]

            areas[i] = areas[maxpos + i + 1]
            areas[maxpos + i + 1] = tarea
            tarea = areas[i]

        # IoU calculate
        xx1 = np.maximum(dets[i, 1], dets[pos:, 1])
        yy1 = np.maximum(dets[i, 0], dets[pos:, 0])
        xx2 = np.minimum(dets[i, 3], dets[pos:, 3])
        yy2 = np.minimum(dets[i, 2], dets[pos:, 2])

        w = np.maximum(0.0, xx2 - xx1 + 1)
        h = np.maximum(0.0, yy2 - yy1 + 1)
        inter = w * h
        ovr = inter / (areas[i] + areas[pos:] - inter)

        # Three methods: 1.linear 2.gaussian 3.original NMS
        if method == 1:  # linear
            weight = np.ones(ovr.shape)
            weight[ovr > Nt] = weight[ovr > Nt] - ovr[ovr > Nt]
        elif method == 2:  # gaussian
            weight = np.exp(-(ovr * ovr) / sigma)
        else:  # original NMS
            weight = np.ones(ovr.shape)
            weight[ovr > Nt] = 0

        scores[pos:] = weight * scores[pos:]

    # select the boxes and keep the corresponding indexes
    inds = dets[:, 4][scores > thresh]
    keep = inds.astype(int)

    return keep

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

namespace nms
{
struct proposal
{
  float score, x1, y1, x2, y2;
};

inline static bool cmp(const proposal& a, const proposal& b)
{
  return a.score < b.score;
}

inline static float iou(const proposal&, const proposal&) __attribute__((always_inline));

static float iou(const proposal& a, const proposal& b)
{
  auto overlap = 0.f;
  float iw  = std::min(b.x2, a.x2) - std::max(b.x1, a.x1) + 1;
  if (iw > 0) {
    float ih = std::min(b.y2, a.y2) - std::max(b.y1, a.y1) + 1;
    if (ih > 0) {
      float ab = (b.x2 - b.x1 + 1) * (b.y2 - b.y1 + 1);
      float aa = (a.x2 - a.x1 + 1) * (a.y2 - a.y1 + 1);
      float inter = iw * ih;
      overlap = inter / (aa + ab - inter);
    }
  }
  return overlap;
}

enum class Method : uint32_t
{
  LINEAR = 0,
  GAUSSIAN,
  HARD
};

size_t soft_nms(float* boxes,
                int32_t* index,
                size_t count,
                Method method,
                float Nt,
                float sigma,
                float threshold)
{
  std::iota(index, index + count, 0);  // np.arange()
  auto p = reinterpret_cast<proposal*>(boxes);

  auto N = count;
  for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
    auto max = std::max_element(p + i, p + N, cmp);
    std::swap(p[i], *max);
    std::swap(index[i], index[max - p]);

    auto j      = i + 1;
    auto weight = 0.f;
    while (j < N) {
      auto ov = iou(p[i], p[j]);
      switch (method) {
        case Method::LINEAR:
          weight = ov > Nt ? 1.f - ov : 1.f;
          break;
        case Method::GAUSSIAN:
          weight = std::exp(-(ov * ov) / sigma);
          break;
        case Method::HARD:
          weight = ov > Nt ? 0.f : 1.f;
          break;
      }
      p[j].score *= weight;
      if (p[j].score < threshold) {
        N--;
        std::swap(p[j], p[N]);
        std::swap(index[j], index[N]);
        j--;
      }
      j++;
    }
  };

  return N;
}
} /* namespace nms */

import numpy as np

def softmax(x: np.array):
    x_max = np.max(x, axis=-1, keepdims=True)
    x -= x_max
    x_exp = np.exp(x)
    s = x_exp / np.sum(x_exp, axis=-1, keepdims=True)
    return s

import cv2

def do_mosaic(frame, x, y, w, h, neighbor=9):
    """
    :param frame: opencv frame
    :param int x :  é©¬èµ›å…‹å·¦é¡¶ç‚¹
    :param int y:  é©¬èµ›å…‹å³é¡¶ç‚¹
    :param int w:  é©¬èµ›å…‹å®½
    :param int h:  é©¬èµ›å…‹é«˜
    :param int neighbor:  é©¬èµ›å…‹æ¯ä¸€å—çš„å®½
    """
    fh, fw = frame.shape[0], frame.shape[1]
    if (y + h > fh) or (x + w > fw):
        return
    for i in range(0, h - neighbor, neighbor):  # å…³é”®ç‚¹0 å‡å»neightbour é˜²æ­¢æº¢å‡º
        for j in range(0, w - neighbor, neighbor):
            rect = [j + x, i + y, neighbor, neighbor]
            color = frame[i + y][j + x].tolist()  # å…³é”®ç‚¹1 tolist
            left_up = (rect[0], rect[1])
            right_down = (rect[0] + neighbor - 1, rect[1] + neighbor - 1)  # å…³é”®ç‚¹2 å‡å»ä¸€ä¸ªåƒç´ 
            cv2.rectangle(frame, left_up, right_down, color, -1)

import cv2
import numpy as np

def gaussian_filter(img, K_size=3, sigma=1.3):

    if len(img.shape) == 3:
        H, W, C = img.shape
    else:
        img = np.expand_dims(img, axis=-1)
        H, W, C = img.shape

    ## Zero padding
    pad = K_size // 2
    out = np.zeros((H + pad * 2, W + pad * 2, C), dtype=np.float)
    out[pad: pad + H, pad: pad + W] = img.copy().astype(np.float)

    ## prepare Kernel
    K = np.zeros((K_size, K_size), dtype=np.float)
    for x in range(-pad, -pad + K_size):
        for y in range(-pad, -pad + K_size):
            K[y + pad, x + pad] = np.exp( -(x ** 2 + y ** 2) / (2 * (sigma ** 2)))

    K /= (2 * np.pi * sigma * sigma)
    K /= K.sum()
    tmp = out.copy()

    # filtering
    for y in range(H):
        for x in range(W):
            for c in range(C):
                out[pad + y, pad + x, c] = np.sum(K * tmp[y: y + K_size, x: x + K_size, c])

    out = np.clip(out, 0, 255)
    out = out[pad: pad + H, pad: pad + W].astype(np.uint8)
    return out

import numpy as np


def means_filter(input_image, filter_size):
    '''
    å‡å€¼æ»¤æ³¢å™¨
    :param input_image: è¾“å…¥å›¾åƒ
    :param filter_size: æ»¤æ³¢å™¨å¤§å°
    :return: è¾“å‡ºå›¾åƒ

    æ³¨ï¼šæ­¤å®ç°æ»¤æ³¢å™¨å¤§å°å¿…é¡»ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°ä¸” >= 3
    '''
    input_image_cp = np.copy(input_image)  # è¾“å…¥å›¾åƒçš„å‰¯æœ¬
    filter_template = np.ones((filter_size, filter_size))  # ç©ºé—´æ»¤æ³¢å™¨æ¨¡æ¿
    pad_num = int((filter_size - 1) / 2)  # è¾“å…¥å›¾åƒéœ€è¦å¡«å……çš„å°ºå¯¸
    input_image_cp = np.pad(input_image_cp, (pad_num, pad_num), mode="constant", constant_values=0)  # å¡«å……è¾“å…¥å›¾åƒ
    m, n = input_image_cp.shape  # è·å–å¡«å……åçš„è¾“å…¥å›¾åƒçš„å¤§å°
    output_image = np.copy(input_image_cp)  # è¾“å‡ºå›¾åƒ

    # ç©ºé—´æ»¤æ³¢
    for i in range(pad_num, m - pad_num):
        for j in range(pad_num, n - pad_num):
            output_image[i, j] = np.sum(filter_template * input_image_cp[i - pad_num:i + pad_num + 1, j - pad_num:j + pad_num + 1]) / (filter_size ** 2)
    output_image = output_image[pad_num:m - pad_num, pad_num:n - pad_num]  # è£å‰ª

    return output_image

import cv2
import numpy as np

def MedianFilter(img,k=3,padding=None):
    imarray=img
    height = imarray.shape[0]
    width = imarray.shape[1]
    if not padding:
        edge = int((k - 1) / 2)
        if height - 1 - edge <= edge or width - 1 - edge <= edge:
            print("The parameter k is to large.")
            return None
        new_arr = np.zeros((height, width), dtype="uint8")
        for i in range(edge,height-edge):
            for j in range(edge,width-edge):
                new_arr[i, j] = np.median(imarray[i - edge:i + edge + 1, j - edge:j + edge + 1])# è°ƒç”¨np.medianæ±‚å–ä¸­å€¼
    return new_arr

def rotate(x, angle):
    h, w, c = x.shape
    if int(angle / 90) % 2 == 0:
        reshape_angle = angle % 90
    else:
        reshape_angle = 90 - (angle % 90)

    radian = math.radians(angle)  # è§’åº¦è½¬å¼§åº¦

    reshape_radian = math.radians(reshape_angle)  # è§’åº¦è½¬å¼§åº¦, åªç”¨æ¥æ±‚æ–°çš„å®½é«˜

    # ä¸‰è§’å‡½æ•°è®¡ç®—å‡ºæ¥çš„ç»“æœä¼šæœ‰å°æ•°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åšäº†å‘ä¸Šå–æ•´çš„æ“ä½œã€‚
    new_height = math.ceil(h * np.cos(reshape_radian) + w * np.sin(reshape_radian))
    new_width = math.ceil(w * np.cos(reshape_radian) + h * np.sin(reshape_radian))

    if c:
        new_img = np.zeros((new_height, new_width, c), dtype=np.uint8)
    else:
        new_img = np.zeros((new_height, new_width), dtype=np.uint8)

    # å›¾åƒåæ ‡ç³»åˆ°æ•°å­¦åæ ‡ç³»
    I2M = np.zeros([3, 3])
    I2M[0, 0] = 1
    I2M[1, 1] = -1
    I2M[2, 2] = 1
    I2M[2, 0] = -0.5 * w
    I2M[2, 1] = 0.5 * h

    # æ•°å­¦åæ ‡ç³»åˆ°å›¾åƒåæ ‡ç³»
    M2I = np.zeros([3, 3])
    M2I[0, 0] = 1
    M2I[1, 1] = -1
    M2I[2, 2] = 1
    M2I[2, 0] = 0.5 * new_width
    M2I[2, 1] = 0.5 * new_height

    kernel = np.zeros([3, 3])
    kernel[0, 0] = np.cos(radian)
    kernel[0, 1] = -np.sin(radian)
    kernel[1, 0] = np.sin(radian)
    kernel[1, 1] = np.cos(radian)
    kernel[2, 2] = 1

    for y0 in range(h):
        for x0 in range(w):
            roi = np.array([x0, y0, 1])
            roi = roi @ I2M @ kernel @ M2I
            new_img[int(roi[1]) - 1, int(roi[0]) - 1] = bgr[int(y0), int(x0)]

    return new_img

def rotate2(x, angle):
    h, w, c = x.shape
    if int(angle / 90) % 2 == 0:
        reshape_angle = angle % 90
    else:
        reshape_angle = 90 - (angle % 90)

    radian = math.radians(angle)  # è§’åº¦è½¬å¼§åº¦

    reshape_radian = math.radians(reshape_angle)  # è§’åº¦è½¬å¼§åº¦

    # ä¸‰è§’å‡½æ•°è®¡ç®—å‡ºæ¥çš„ç»“æœä¼šæœ‰å°æ•°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åšäº†å‘ä¸Šå–æ•´çš„æ“ä½œã€‚
    new_height = math.ceil(h * np.cos(reshape_radian) + w * np.sin(reshape_radian))
    new_width = math.ceil(w * np.cos(reshape_radian) + h * np.sin(reshape_radian))

    if c:
        new_img = np.zeros((new_height, new_width, c), dtype=np.uint8)
    else:
        new_img = np.zeros((new_height, new_width), dtype=np.uint8)

    # å›¾åƒåæ ‡ç³»åˆ°æ•°å­¦åæ ‡ç³»
    I2M = np.zeros([3, 3])
    I2M[0, 0] = 1
    I2M[1, 1] = -1
    I2M[2, 2] = 1
    I2M[2, 0] = -0.5 * new_width
    I2M[2, 1] = 0.5 * new_height

    # æ•°å­¦åæ ‡ç³»åˆ°å›¾åƒåæ ‡ç³»
    M2I = np.zeros([3, 3])
    M2I[0, 0] = 1
    M2I[1, 1] = -1
    M2I[2, 2] = 1
    M2I[2, 0] = 0.5 * w
    M2I[2, 1] = 0.5 * h

    kernel = np.zeros([3, 3])
    kernel[0, 0] = np.cos(radian)
    kernel[0, 1] = np.sin(radian)
    kernel[1, 0] = -np.sin(radian)
    kernel[1, 1] = np.cos(radian)
    kernel[2, 2] = 1

    for y0 in range(new_height):
        for x0 in range(new_width):
            roi = np.array([x0, y0, 1])
            roi = roi @ I2M @ kernel @ M2I
            if 0 < int(roi[0]) <= w and 0 < int(roi[1]) <= h:
                new_img[int(y0), int(x0)] = bgr[int(roi[1]) - 1, int(roi[0]) - 1]

    return new_img

def meanFilter(matrix, k):
    ss = (k - 1) // 2
    for y in range(ss, h - ss):
        for x in range(ss, w - ss):
            y0 = y - ss - 1
            x0 = x - ss - 1
    
            y1 = y + ss
            x1 = x + ss
    
            if y == ss:
                if x == ss:
                    matrix[y, x] = graph[y1, x1] / (k * k)
                else:
                    m = (graph[y1, x1] - graph[y1, x0]) / (k * k)
                    matrix[y, x] = m
    
            elif x == ss:
                m = (graph[y1, x1] - graph[y0, x1]) / (k * k)
                matrix[y, x] = m
    
            else:
                m = (graph[y1, x1] + graph[x0, y0] - graph[y1, x0] - graph[y0, x1]) / (k * k)
                matrix[y, x] = m
    return matrix

def bilinear(src_img, dst_shape):
    """
    åŒçº¿æ€§æ’å€¼æ³•,æ¥è°ƒæ•´å›¾ç‰‡å°ºå¯¸

    :param org_img: åŸå§‹å›¾ç‰‡
    :param dst_shape: è°ƒæ•´åçš„ç›®æ ‡å›¾ç‰‡çš„å°ºå¯¸
    :return:    è¿”å›è°ƒæ•´å°ºå¯¸åçš„å›¾ç‰‡çŸ©é˜µä¿¡æ¯
    """
    dst_img = np.zeros((dst_shape[0], dst_shape[1], 3), np.uint8)
    dst_h, dst_w = dst_shape
    src_h = src_img.shape[0]
    src_w = src_img.shape[1]
    # iï¼šçºµåæ ‡yï¼Œjï¼šæ¨ªåæ ‡x
    # ç¼©æ”¾å› å­ï¼Œdw,dh
    scale_w = src_w / dst_w
    scale_h = src_h / dst_h

    for i in range(dst_h):
        for j in range(dst_w):
            src_x = float((j + 0.5) * scale_w - 0.5)
            src_y = float((i + 0.5) * scale_h - 0.5)

            # å‘ä¸‹å–æ•´ï¼Œä»£è¡¨é è¿‘æºç‚¹çš„å·¦ä¸Šè§’çš„é‚£ä¸€ç‚¹çš„è¡Œåˆ—å·
            src_x_int = math.floor(src_x)
            src_y_int = math.floor(src_y)

            # å–å‡ºå°æ•°éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œç”¨äºæ„é€ æƒå€¼
            src_x_float = src_x - src_x_int
            src_y_float = src_y - src_y_int

            if src_x_int + 1 == src_w or src_y_int + 1 == src_h:
                dst_img[i, j, :] = src_img[src_y_int, src_x_int, :]
                continue
            dst_img[i, j, :] = (1. - src_y_float) * (1. - src_x_float) * src_img[src_y_int, src_x_int, :] + \
                               (1. - src_y_float) * src_x_float * src_img[src_y_int, src_x_int + 1, :] + \
                               src_y_float * (1. - src_x_float) * src_img[src_y_int + 1, src_x_int, :] + \
                               src_y_float * src_x_float * src_img[src_y_int + 1, src_x_int + 1, :]
    return dst_img
